description: Extract a specific key from a Data object or a list of Data objects and return the extracted value(s) as Data object(s).

data_input.info: The Data object or list of Data objects to extract the key from.

key.info: The key in the Data object(s) to extract.

success.extracted_from_single: Successfully extracted key '{key}' from Data object
success.extracted_from_list: Successfully extracted key '{key}' from {count} Data objects

warnings.empty_data_list: Empty data list provided. Nothing to extract.
warnings.key_missing_in_some: Key '{key}' was missing in {missing} objects but found in {found} objects

errors.empty_key: Key cannot be empty. Please specify a key to extract.
errors.invalid_data_type_in_list: Expected Data object at index {index}, got {actual_type}
errors.key_not_found_in_any: Key '{key}' not found in any of the {total} Data objects
errors.key_not_found_in_data: Key '{key}' not found in Data object. Available keys: {available_keys}
errors.invalid_input_type: Invalid input type. Expected Data object or list of Data objects, got {actual_type}
